t: Amazon.com : Magnetic Lashes and Liner, Lorchar Magnetic Eyelashes with Eyeliner,Upgrade Magnetic Eyeliner and Eyelashes, Natural Looking Magnetic Eyelashes, Magnetic Lashes with Applicator, 5 Pairs : Beauty & Personal Care
s: This brand has a few different eyelashes with different magnetic eyeliner. This one in particular has a very sticky eyeliner. Even if you let it dry it’s tacky. I cannot use it because every time I blink it sticks to my upper lid. It basically is black liquid glue. The lashes are OK. But they cannot be used with other Lorchar ...

t: Amazon.com: Magnetic Eyelashes with Eyeliner, Magnetic Lashes and Magnetic Eyeliner Kit, Magnetic Eyelashes with Applicator, Natural Looking Magnetic Eyelashes 5 Pairs, No Glue Needed : Beauty & Personal Care
s: The lashes are nice, but the eyeliner is not magnetic at all. It stays Super sticky regardless of how long you let it dry. I bought a different brand to try alongside and compare to the Lorchar brand, and the other eyeliner is definitely magnetic.

November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

15 hours ago - Amazon sells many products under its own brand names, including phone chargers, batteries, and diaper wipes. The AmazonBasics brand was introduced in 2009, and now features hundreds of product lines, including smartphone cases, computer mice, batteries, dumbbells, and dog crates.
